name: Idle RPG (Jason)
description:
"Idle RPG" is the first Jason's attempt of incremental game genre wherein all you have to do is sit down and watch when your hero automatically brings hostiles down. Face with 250 enemies to reach to the last and destroy him. Meanwhile gain experience, drink health potions, buy equipment and collect achievements playing in two language versions.

UPDATES

1.0.1 (10th January, 2019)

- added the "X" icon in initial language selection menu to indicate correct key for option select

INSTRUCTIONS

arrow keys - navigation
up arrow key (while game) - health potion
X - select / continue
Z - back / pause
Enter / P - PICO-8 menu

You don't need to worry about critical health level. The hero will drink a health potion automatically if you have it.

This game contains two editions: Free and Premium. Free Edition allows you to familiarize with the game, how it looks and if it's good in your opinion. Premium is a paid version of the game which unlocks entire content like additional levels, special skills or difficulty levels.

Free Edition of the "Idle RPG" offers only:

* playing on Normal difficulty
* buying equipment up to level 4
* collecting 18 of 30 achievements

Feel free to visit my website: https://jasonxiii.pl/en

Buy now Premium Edition to bypass above limits!
Premium Edition is an executable file for Windows, Mac and Linux.
